text: Django Sissoko (1948 – 4 April 2022) was a Malian politician. He was the Prime Minister of Mali from December 2012 to September 2013. He was Minister of Justice from 1984 to 1988. Sissoko died on 4 April 2022 in Bamako, Mali.Le Mali en deuil: L’ancien premier ministre Diango Cissoko n’est plus! ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Prime ministers of Mali
title: Django Sissoko
